column8: Housed within the Lord Byron hotel, one of Forte del Marmi’s best hotels, this restaurant serves technically skilful and sophisticated cuisine which is striking and beautifully presented. The menu features meat and fish dishes with local and international influences, as well as a strong flavour of Campania, the chef’s native region. The excellent bread deserves a particular mention.
